sentences.pinyin: jīn tiān de hǎi yáng fēi cháng píng jìng.
sentences.translation: The ocean is very tranquil today.

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管生活中充满挑战，他仍然能保持平静的心态。
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管生活中充滿挑戰，他仍然能保持平靜的心態。
sentences.pinyin: jǐn guǎn shēng huó zhōng chōng mǎn tiǎo zhàn, tā réng rán néng bǎo chí píng jìng de xīn tài.
sentences.translation: Despite the challenges in life, he is still able to maintain a tranquil mindset.

sentences.simplifiedText: 她的脸上总是流露出平静的表情。
sentences.traditionalText: 她的臉上總是流露出平靜的表情。
sentences.pinyin: tā de liǎn shàng zǒng shì liú lù chū píng jìng de biǎo qíng.
sentences.translation: Her face always shows a serene expression.

sentences.simplifiedText: 虽然她面临生活的压力和困难，但却总是能够保持平静的心态。
sentences.traditionalText: 雖然她面臨生活的壓力和困難，但卻總是能夠保持平靜的心態。
sentences.pinyin: suī rán tā miàn lín shēng huó de yā lì hé kùn nán, dàn què zǒng shì néng gòu bǎo chí píng jìng de xīn tài.
sentences.translation: Despite facing the pressures and difficulties of life, she is always able to maintain a serene mindset.
